
   .bg-block {
                display: none;
                background: unset;
            }
            @media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {
                .bg-block {
                    display: block;
                    width: 100vw;
                    height: 100vh;
                    position: absolute;
                    z-index: -1;
                    top: 0;
                    left: 0;
                    background: url(data:image/png;base64,)
                    no-repeat left top;
                }
            }
  
     .cls-1 { fill-rule: evenodd; }
